de.fhg.fit.biomos.sensorplatform.system

Class Cubieboard3

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fhg.fit.biomos.sensorplatform.system.Cubieboard3
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HardwarePlatform, Runnable

    public class Cubieboard3
extends Object
implements HardwarePlatform
    Functionality for the Sensorplatform running on a Cubieboard 3. Most of the stuff is NYI.
    Author:
    Daniel Pyka

      • evaluateSignalQuality

        public void evaluateSignalQuality()
        Description copied from interface: HardwarePlatform
        Use various parameters to determine, if the surf stick is able to upload the heart rate data power efficient. This method is intended to set an internal upload permission flag in the concrete implementation of hardware platform.
        Specified by:
        evaluateSignalQuality in interface HardwarePlatform

        Returns:
